```{r}
hotel <- read.csv("hotel_bookings_updated_2024.csv")
selected_hotels <- hotel[hotel$hotel == "City Hotel - Ahmedabad", ]
selected_hotels$company <- NULL
```

```{r}
dim(selected_hotels)

```

```{r}
clean_hotels <- na.omit(selected_hotels)
any(is.na(clean_hotels))
```
